subject: Relationships
title: Online Friends: Are They Real?
description: A quick win: understand Online Friends: Are They Real?.

hook.text: They've never met in person, but they talk every day. She trusts her online friend more than her neighbor.

buildup.text: Online friendships now account for 30% of close friendships among adults under 30.

discovery.text: Research shows online friends provide comparable emotional support to in-person friends for many people.

twist.text: But online friends can't hold your hand in a hospital. Physical presence activates bonding systems screens can't reach.

climax.text: Online friendships are real â€” with real limits. They supplement in-person bonds but can't fully replace them.

punchline.text: Online friends are real. But some bonds need physical presence to complete.

quiz.question: What percentage of close friendships among young adults are online?
